name: Gunworks
description:
THEME: Paying the price
Make the enemies pay the price for shooting you by reflecting their own bullets back at them, or pay the price by flying away from your enemy when you shoot too close to them.

Key binding:
Run: A / D
Jump: W
interact: E
Shoot: Left-click
Reflect: Right-click

Story:
The evil boring corporation has made the biggest firework in the world but don't intend on launching it. It's your job to stop boring corp by launching your self through the building to reach the boss of boring corp.
